xtc.lang.blink.agent

Class AgentVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtc.lang.blink.agent.AgentVariable

  • public class AgentVariable
extends Object
    Blink's support for the convenience variables in Java. This class in particular represents a set of polymorphic convenience variables to hold both the java primitive and reference values.

    • Method Summary
